## isDescendant() function

Gets indication whether is child descendand of parent

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isDescendant(parent: HTMLElement, child: HTMLElement): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | HTMLElement | Parent to be tested |
|  child | HTMLElement | Child to be looked for |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
